name: Teaching and Learning a Second/Foreign Language
description: In this course, students will learn how language teaching methods have evolved since the 1960s. Different teaching approaches (behaviourist, audio-visual, communicative, cognitive and humanistic) will be examined with special emphasis on the teaching of the four skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking) and culture, on the roles of the teacher and the learner in the classroom. [48L, 24T]
